resources.string:
FUNCTION USES: 
Airline: 
Used as intended. The creation of an Airline object with a collection of Flights. 

AirlineXmlHelper: 
Used in conjunction with XmlDumper and XmlParser. 

Flight: 
Used as intended. The creation of a Flight object. 

PrettyPrinter: 
Pretty Print an Airline and its flights. 

TextDumper: 
Dump an Airline and its flights into a text file. Used for Android local storage. 

TextParser: 
Parse from a text file. Used for Android local storage. 

XmlDumper: 
Dump an Airline and its flights into an xml file. Used for Android local storage. 

XmlParser: 
Parse from an xml file. Used for Android local storage

PROJECT 4: Small Device App 

SUBMITION/DEVELOPED BY: Ramon Guarnes 942268924 

CLASS: CS410P Advanced Programming with Java 

TEACHER: David Whitlock 

DUE DATE: March 18, 2020 before 5:30PM 


DESCRIPTION: In Project 6, my job is to implement an android application with all the functionality of the past projects. This includes airline and flight creation, searching for an airline, pretty printing, text dumping, and xml dumping. If there is an error that occurs, a pop up window will come up to tell you of what error you've made.
